reviewText: I chose the film because I had seen it and wanted to own it.  I love the author of the book it's based upon, and the lead actor is very fine at his craft.  I would recommend this film to people interested in art and human relationships.

reviewText: The point made by this movie is that persistence and waiting for love with the right person works out in the end, despite much waiting and sorrow.  Knowing with the heart is superior than attempting to rise into a higher social class.  The scenery is beautiful.  The story is not as strong in the movie as it was in the book.  Details of locale and politics were glossed over.
summary: Good, but the book was better
Title: N/A

reviewText: Just loved this movie, spectacular acting...and the theme of waiting for your one true love.  Proving also that it's never too late for dreams to come true.
